metadata.name: Sindri
metadata.description:
Each Puff-P has a unique personality and loves outdoor activities in the best spots of Iceland. Every of the 100 original NFTs is unique and hand tuned to match each scene's atmosphere. 

In time, the collection might grow up to a maximum of 500 Puff-Ps. Every primary sale of this collection gives back 10% of profit to Sea Shepherd Conservation Society for taking care of the oceans, which are the puffins' environment.
